duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure the representation, stocking, and maintenance of leading brands like Oreo, Ritz, belVita, Chips Ahoy, Triscuit, and others on shelves and displays.
Follow Sales Representative’s plans within stores and communicate issues with the management team.
Work with the operations team to ensure efficient in-store service by following the daily route plan.
Collaborate with sales representatives to optimize product visibility and construct promotional displays.
Enhance seasonal sales, seasonal displays, and new product launches.
Maintain a professional, positive, and upbeat attitude while representing the brand in the store.
